biography.bio: Actor, director, producer and also a singer, in the early 70s Renato formed a memorable duo with Cochi Ponzoni ("Cochi e Renato"), when together they produced many programs for Italian television, like "Quelli della domenica", "Canzonissima" and "Il poeta e il contadino". After this experience Pozzetto worked for many important Italian directors. He made his debut in a leading role in 1974 in Flavio Mogherini's film To Love Ophelia (1974). His trademark is surreal and grotesque comedy with his characteristic awkward expression. Maybe his most brilliant performance was in _Da Grande (1987)_ which probably inspired _Big (1987)_, a film with Tom Hanks.
biography.name: Renato Pozzetto

biography.bio: Maddalena Crippa was born on September 4, 1957 in Besana Brianza, Italy. She is an actress, known for Trois frères (1981), In carne e ossa (2009) and No Thanks, Coffee Makes Me Nervous (1982). She is married to Peter Stein.
biography.name: Maddalena Crippa

biography.bio: Giulia Fossà was born on September 22, 1963 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is an actress and director, known for Gli invisibili (1988), Volevo i pantaloni (1990) and Caccia alle mosche (1993).
biography.name: Giulia Fossà

biography.bio: Cinzia Leone was born on March 4, 1959 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is an actress, known for Une famille formidable (1992), Stasera a casa di Alice (1990) and Margherita (1995).
biography.name: Cinzia Leone

biography.bio: Giorgio Del Bene is an actor, known for La banca di Monate (1975), Non più di uno (1990) and Les requins du désert (1977).
biography.name: Giorgio Del Bene

biography.bio: Orsetta Gregoretti was born on January 24, 1964 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is an actress, known for Macaroni (1985), Cuando calienta el sol... vamos a la playa (1982) and In viaggio con papà (1982).
biography.name: Orsetta Gregoretti

biography.bio: Susanna Javicoli was born on August 7, 1954 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is known for her work on Suspiria (1977), Juste un baiser (2001) and Ecce bombo (1978). She died on June 17, 2005 in Rome.
biography.name: Susanna Javicoli

biography.bio: Maurizio Fardo is an actor, known for Io e mia sorella (1987), Suffocating Heat (1991) and Indio 2 - La rivolta (1991).
biography.name: Maurizio Fardo

biography.bio: Manuela Gatti is an actress, known for La grande bellezza (2013), Francesca è mia (1986) and Quel treno per Budapest (1990).
biography.name: Manuela Gatti

biography.bio: Claudio Lorimer was born on December 2, 1961 in Florence, Tuscany, Italy. He is known for his work on I ragazzi del muretto (1991), Berlin Affair (1985) and Francesco (1989).
biography.name: Claudio Lorimer

biography.bio: Pao Pei Andreoli was born on April 16, 1968 in London, England as Gabriele Pao Pei Andreoli. He is an actor and producer, known for I ragazzi del muretto (1991), My Own Private Idaho (1991) and Time to Kill (1989).
biography.name: Pao Pei Andreoli

biography.bio: Bianca Alessandra Ara is an actress, known for Titanic, le légende continue (2000), Spaghetti Family (2003) and Non più di uno (1990).
biography.name: Bianca Alessandra Ara

biography.bio: Giorgio Biavati was born on November 5, 1945 in Bologna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Un coeur pour la vie (1998), L'autostop (1991) and Black as the Heart (1994).
biography.name: Giorgio Biavati

biography.bio: Guido Cerniglia is an actor and writer, known for La Cage aux Folles (1978), Istruzioni per l'uso (2014) and End of the Game (1975).
biography.name: Guido Cerniglia

biography.bio: Stefano Oppedisano was born on November 29, 1946 in Palermo, Sicily, Italy. He is an actor, known for Duck, You Sucker (1971), The Cat o' Nine Tails (1971) and Il cavaliere inesistente (1969).
biography.name: Stefano Oppedisano
